column4: Hello, everyone, I would be grateful for some help. I have a problem with either wine or compiz or both. I installed the new version of wine while running compiz and it didn't seem to be working. I hear that there are compatibility issues with the two so I tried to figure out how to disable compiz without uninstalling. i couldn't figure it out so I just disabled ever option individually. Now, I don't know what to do. My windows for every application are
your windows for every application are what?
how are they not visible? completely gone? white?
